TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AmbientTheme extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 為設計階段環境的最上層工作流程提供外觀及操作屬性設定。

span.span: Provides the look and feel property settings to a top-level workflow in a design-time environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程主題定義了工作流程設計介面的外觀及操作。Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface. 這包含工作流程設計介面定義的所有背景樣式、前景樣式、字型和圖示。This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface. 環境主題包含了工作流程設計介面的預設顯示屬性。An ambient theme contains the default display properties for the workflow design surface. 它提供了在整個設計介面中使用的設定 (例如格線、背景和前景色彩、唯讀設計工具色彩等等)。It provides settings to be used across the entire design surface (for example, the grid, background and foreground colors, read-only designer color, and so on). 而且可以採用使用者選取的值或作業系統提供的值。It can use either user-selected values or the values from the operational system.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範一般用來從衍生自 類別的類別中存取 屬性的方式。The following code example demonstrates a common way you can access the property from a class that derives from the class. 這個程式碼範例是 DatabaseService.cs 檔案中工作流程監視器 SDK 範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DatabaseService.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程監視](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何將 設定為 false。The following code example demonstrates how you can set to false. 對工作流程設計介面進行此動作，表示任何顯示在設計介面上的 物件都不會顯示其相關聯的 物件。Doing this for a workflow design surface means that none of the objects displayed on the design surface will display their associated objects. 這個程式碼範例是 WorkflowDesignerControl.cs 檔案中 Tracking Profile Designer SDK 範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Tracking Profile Designer SDK Sample from the WorkflowDesignerControl.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Tracking Profile Designer 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#125](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#125)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#125](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#125)]

summary.span: 取得或設定工作流程設計介面上顯示的文字品質。

span.span: Gets or sets the text quality to display on the workflow design surface.

value.span: ，指定工作流程設計介面上使用的文字品質設定。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以讓您判斷工作流程設計介面及其所有子設計工具上顯示的文字，是否已消除鋸齒。 allows you to determine whether the text displayed on a workflow design surface, and all its child designers, is anti-aliased or aliased. 已消除鋸齒的文字會提供較高的文字顯示品質，而鋸齒文字則消耗較少的資源。Anti-aliased text provides higher quality text display, while aliased text requires fewer resources to maintain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 來關聯一個影像做為工作流程設計介面的浮水印。Use to associate an image as a watermark image for a workflow design surface. 如果 不是 `null` (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)，當您設定 時， 將處置 使用的所有資源，並且設定其值為 `null` (`Nothing`)。If is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when you set , disposes of any resources used by and sets its value to `null` (`Nothing`).
